name: YOUR ROAR - #LD33 (You Are The Monster)
description:
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=p...

YOUR ROAR // #LD33

Roar into your microphone to attack unsuspecting cuties! The louder you roar the faster you charge towards your prey. Use the 'A' and 'D' keys to steer yourself as you eat up as many cuties as you can and try not to get shot by the security cuties!

'A' and 'D' to turn.
Roar into your microphone to move forward and attack.
(If you don't have a mic, Space Bar works too.)
Eat as many peeps as you can to get points and HP.
Don't die!

fermentergames.com
@fermentergames
